achievements.name: Crash Course
achievements.description: Complete all basic tutorials.

achievements.name: Friends in High Places
achievements.description: Reach highest reputation with any faction.

achievements.name: Nice Pile
achievements.description: Get one billion Credits in your account.

achievements.name: A Significant Bit
achievements.description: Destroy 128 Xenon ships.

achievements.name: Let's Build
achievements.description: Construct 10 stations.

achievements.name: Space Taxi
achievements.description: Finish 20 passenger transport missions.

achievements.name: Adblock
achievements.description: Destroy 20 Ad Signs.

achievements.name: Finders, Keepers
achievements.description: Force 50 pilots to abandon their ships.

achievements.name: Nailed Down
achievements.description: Destroy the engines of a capital ship.

achievements.name: Capital Punishment
achievements.description: Destroy a Xenon capital ship.

achievements.name: Ship Breaker
achievements.description: Destroy all the surface elements on a capital ship.

achievements.name: Bug Fixed
achievements.description: Destroy a Kha'ak ship.

achievements.name: Liberator
achievements.description: Claim ten ships.

achievements.name: Ship Collection
achievements.description: Own at least 20 ships.

achievements.name: Explorer
achievements.description: Discover all sectors.

achievements.name: Tinkerer
achievements.description: Apply a modification to your ship at a workbench.

achievements.name: Bling Bling
achievements.description: Apply a paint modification to your ship.

achievements.name: Miner's Luck
achievements.description: Mine the most valuable crystal node.

achievements.name: Captain of Industry
achievements.description: Achieve trade rank Entrepreneur.

achievements.name: X-Treme Trader
achievements.description: Achieve trade rank X-TREME.

achievements.name: Combat Pro
achievements.description: Achieve fight rank Colonel.

achievements.name: X-Treme Fighter
achievements.description: Achieve fight rank X-TREME.

achievements.name: Rising Property Values
achievements.description: Licence the biggest available plot for your station.

achievements.name: Have to Start Somewhere
achievements.description: Build the first module of a station.

achievements.name: In a Galaxy Far, Far Away
achievements.description: Send a ship on a venture.

achievements.name: Back Home
achievements.description: Have a ship successfully return from a venture.

achievements.name: What Just Happened?
achievements.description: Travel through an anomaly.

achievements.name: Where am I?
achievements.description: Teleport to a different location.

achievements.name: Space Odyssey
achievements.description: Travel through a superhighway in your space suit.

achievements.name: Piggyback
achievements.description: Dock at a ship that is docked at a capital ship.

achievements.name: Something Strange in our Neighbourhood
achievements.description: Help investigate the strange readings.

achievements.name: That's No Moon!
achievements.description: Discover the mysterious installation.

achievements.name: Meet Your Mentor
achievements.description: Come face to face with your head of research.

achievements.name: Answer the Call
achievements.description: Sign up for a war subscription.

achievements.name: Double Agent
achievements.description: Sign up for a war on opposing sides.

achievements.name: A Good Investment
achievements.description: Join a trade guild.

achievements.name: It's Just Business
achievements.description: Join the Scale Plate Pact.

achievements.name: Turning the Tide
achievements.description: Complete 20 war missions for a faction.

achievements.name: It fell out of a ship.
achievements.description: Pick up 99 containers in space.

achievements.name: Treasure Hunter
achievements.description: Find and open 33 lock-boxes.

achievements.name: Can't Shoot This
achievements.description: Destroy 100 turrets.

achievements.name: Historian
achievements.description: Find all timeline entries by accessing data vaults.

achievements.name: Data Mining
achievements.description: Acquire a module blueprint through hacking.

achievements.name: Science!
achievements.description: Finish a research item.

achievements.name: A Matter of the Utmost Gravity
achievements.description: Learn about the Paranid Civil War and pave the path for change.

achievements.name: Holy Three-Dimensionality
achievements.description: Complete the Paranid Unification storyline.

achievements.name: Balance and Buccaneers
achievements.description: Complete the Duke's Buccaneers' storyline.

achievements.name: That Could Have Gone Better
achievements.description: Do all you can to help Hatikvah's aspirations.

achievements.name: Did I forget to lock the door?
achievements.description: Receive an uninvited guest at one of your stations.

achievements.name: Righteous Fury
achievements.description: Enact revenge and restore your honour in the gamestart "Fires of Defeat" (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: They Are Gone
achievements.description: Fulfil the Patriarch's orders in the gamestart "Spear of the Patriarch" (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: Fires of Fate
achievements.description: Learn about the Split and pave the path for change (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: Curbed Ambitions
achievements.description: Complete the Split storyline and side against the Patriarchy (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: Fists of the Empire
achievements.description: Complete the Split storyline and side with the Patriarchy (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: Yes, Yes, Very Interesting
achievements.description: Learn all you can about slavery (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: In Authority We Trust
achievements.description: Work with the Patriarchy Police during the Split storyline (requires the Split Vendetta expansion).

achievements.name: What is Best in Life
achievements.description: Cut the Paranid peace celebrations short.
Contemplate life, the universe and everything (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Superior Manoeuvres
achievements.description: Complete the Terran Cadet gamestart mission (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Access Granted
achievements.description: Get permission to enter the Sol Inner Core (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Access Denied
achievements.description: Enter the Earth sector without permission (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Missing in Action
achievements.description: Risk your life in the defence of Sol (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Gather Essential Data
achievements.description: Gather data inside the Torus wreckage with help of a friend (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: A Glimpse of Home
achievements.description: Help Boso observe the Great Reef Nebula (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Advanced Terraforming
achievements.description: Unlock advanced Terraforming Projects developed from Segarian research and data from Terran archives (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Hold up a minute!
achievements.description: Almost give the game away (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: From the Shadows
achievements.description: Sow discord between two allied Factions without them realizing (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: This Ship has Sprung a Leak
achievements.description: Blow the whistle on the whole operation (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Cold Feet
achievements.description: Decide that the Status Quo reigns supreme (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Case Closed
achievements.description: Conclude your investigation and uncover a threat to humanity (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Never Heard of Him
achievements.description: Conclude your investigation and find nothing out of the ordinary (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Amplified Destruction
achievements.description: Rid the Yaki of their greatest asset (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Mission Accomplished
achievements.description: After informing the Terran fleet, see a potential threat to Sol annihilated (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: Push the Button
achievements.description: Go along with Orcanic's plan and guide the Xenon to greener pastures (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: A Heart for Pirates
achievements.description: Save the Yaki against their will (requires the Cradle of Humanity expansion).

achievements.name: The First of Many
achievements.description: Complete a terraforming project.

achievements.name: Plasma Cannons to Ploughshares
achievements.description: Complete a terraforming mission.

achievements.name: Xenon Got Nothing on Me
achievements.description: Complete a terraforming mission with an "impossible" difficulty.

achievements.name: Because I Can
achievements.description: Complete 7 terraforming missions.

achievements.name: Bestowed in Perpetuity
achievements.description: Make a friend before the Tide comes in (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Negotiation Guide
achievements.description: Guide your partner successfully through trading negotiations (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Unleashed Market
achievements.description: Witness a monopoly at play (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Standing Firm
achievements.description: Resist the Northriver Company's overtures (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Climbing the Corporate Ladder
achievements.description: Fall in line with the Northriver Company (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: The Freest of Markets
achievements.description: Give the people what they need, but at a price (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Market Regulation
achievements.description: Help the Riptide Rakers out of a tough spot (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: One Busy Chipmunk
achievements.description: Store illicit goods in your cheek pouch (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: The Wildcard
achievements.description: Earn your place within the Curs (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: On Raven Wings
achievements.description: Leave the Ministry Science Division Hangar with newly acquired technology (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: The Empyrean Curs
achievements.description: Successfully complete the heist and get everyone out alive (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Breaking up the Band
achievements.description: Aid the authorities' efforts to apprehend dangerous criminals (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Something of a Predicament
achievements.description: Escape from prison (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Lone Wolf
achievements.description: Escape from prison without help (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: With Due Diligence
achievements.description: Complete your delivery to Aurora station (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Running Hot
achievements.description: Escape the Syndicate Enforcers (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Ride the Tide
achievements.description: Be safely docked at a station when the wave hits (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: King of the Scrap Heap
achievements.description: Locate the Erlking and gain possession of it (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Riding Late Through Night And Wind
achievements.description: Fully upgrade the Erlking (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Early Retirement
achievements.description: Acquire a uniquely luxurious yacht (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Destination Unknown
achievements.description: Leave the Jump Gate network (requires the Tides of Avarice expansion).

achievements.name: Prepare a Disco
achievements.description: Activate all ship modes in quick succession.

achievements.name: No Coup for You
achievements.description: Destroy a storage module of a Duke's Lost Property Office station.

achievements.name: A Pirate's Life for Me
achievements.description: Intimidate a pilot into dropping some of their cargo.

achievements.name: Environmentally Aware
achievements.description: Tow a recyclable object to a processing module.

achievements.name: Circular Economy
achievements.description: Recycle 100 objects.

achievements.name: Provinces Adrift
achievements.description: Find the Boron (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Respect and Understanding
achievements.description: Negotiate an entirely satisfactory outcome (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Darkness Lifted
achievements.description: Discover all points of interest in Sanctuary of Darkness (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: The Cipher
achievements.description: Help Boso make a stellar discovery (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Kingdom Come
achievements.description: Make your way to Kingdom End (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Queen's Herald
achievements.description: Obtain a royal mandate from the Queen (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Through the Hornets' Nest
achievements.description: Complete The High Road mission (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: A Taste of Things To Come
achievements.description: Complete a very special delivery (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: A Herald's Duty
achievements.description: Complete a royal errand (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: A Queendom Returned
achievements.description: Complete all royal errands (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: A Trillion Drops in the Ocean
achievements.description: Complete the Ocean of Fantasy terraforming project (requires the Kingdom End expansion).

achievements.name: Command and Control
achievements.description: Give the "Start Position Defence" order to a carrier.

achievements.name: Bob the Builder
achievements.description: Build a module of each type on one station.

achievements.name: Overkill
achievements.description: Destroy a ship with a single shot (excluding mass traffic).

achievements.name: That's Mine Now
achievements.description: Claim any sector.

achievements.name: Friends in Low Places
achievements.description: Gain access to the black market.

achievements.name: Higher Education
achievements.description: Complete all intermediate tutorials.

achievements.name: Scholar of X Studies
achievements.description: Complete all advanced tutorials.

achievements.name: Deus in Machina
achievements.description: Personally take control of a Xenon ship.

achievements.name: After the Cataclysm
achievements.description: Survive your first Crisis event.

achievements.name: Crisis Averted
achievements.description: Resolve the Xenon Crisis.

achievements.name: Who Ravages the Ravagers?
achievements.description: Destroy a Kha'ak Ravager.

achievements.name: Zoooom
achievements.description: Shoot down a ship while zoomed in with your VE Goggles.

achievements.name: Third Person Shooter
achievements.description: Destroy 10 ships while in external view (excluding mass traffic).

achievements.name: Look on My Works
achievements.description: Survey your station from your own Observation Deck.

achievements.name: A Blast from the Past
achievements.description: Visit the Wreck point of interest in Moo-Kye's Revenge.

achievements.name: MD's Pride and Joy
achievements.description: Earn a 5 star rating in a Nodus (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Exanaut
achievements.description: Earn a 3 star rating in every Nodus (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Yottanaut
achievements.description: Earn a 4 star rating in every Nodus (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Quettanaut
achievements.description: Earn a 5 star rating in every Nodus (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: A Different Way of Doing Things
achievements.description: Complete a barter mission (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Xenon Slayer
achievements.description: Destroy a Xenon ship in an Open Universe game with your Xperimental Shuttle (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Your New Digs
achievements.description: Complete the induction into the Facility (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Found in the Light
achievements.description: Find the answers you were looking for (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Grandmother
achievements.description: Complete the Timelines Epilogue (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Window of Opportunity
achievements.description: In Rise Against the Machines, destroy a capital ship while it is disabled (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Keep Floating And Nobody Explodes
achievements.description: In Bomb Disposal Amateur, neutralise all bombs without raising suspicion (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Not a Scratch
achievements.description: Complete Defanging the Defence or Capital Ship Engagement without taking any hull damage (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Laser-Focus
achievements.description: In Pre-Battle Skirmish, don't destroy anything that's not a mission target (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Whoops, Wrong Mission
achievements.description: In 17th Getsu Fune Asteroid Smasher Showdown, deliver a shipment of minerals (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Logistical Efficiency
achievements.description: In A Merchant Mind, Teladi Trading Try-Outs or Frontline Dealings, buy products at every station before undocking (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Perfectly Planned
achievements.description: In The Admonisher, eliminate your target using mines (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Move like a Spacefly
achievements.description: Complete Hazing the Newbie or Space Suit Biathlon without colliding (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Strong Signal
achievements.description: Complete the transmission in Signal Strength with at least 3 satellites intact (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Rubbing is Racing
achievements.description: Ram a competitor in Asteroid Dash, Spaceport Stride or Station Circuit (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: It's a Spy!
achievements.description: In Impeded Extraction, find and destroy the spying scout ship (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Erfmancklest SMASH
achievements.description: In 17th Getsu Fune Asteroid Smasher Showdown, deplete an asteroid by mining all of its nodes, then destroy it (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: It's All Connected
achievements.description: Figure out how to make things easier for Escape From Faulty Logic: The Ferryman (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
achievements.description: In Mine Your Own Business, personally take control of a mining ship (requires the Timelines expansion).

achievements.name: Risky Research
achievements.description: Consider researching the Fleet-Wide Sensor Analytics.

achievements.name: What's the worst that could happen?
achievements.description: Research the Fleet-Wide Sensor Analytics.

achievements.name: The Mighty Galleon
achievements.description: Locate the famous Hyperion and receive it as a reward (requires the Hyperion Pack expansion).
